title: (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) 

(Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited assisted decision-making (capacity) (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) (no 3) order 2023

title: (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister
heading: 2. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
2. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which sections 
72 to 77 of the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) (Amendment) Act 2022 
(No. 46 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 April, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [195] 3
